About me

I enjoy programming and have used tools such as MERN stack and Matlab in my projects. This year, I would like to work on projects that utilise Python and Java and will update this space as I go along in my exploratory journey.

When not coding, you will find me grooving to music, reading, checking out markets or on the hunt for the best dessert in town.

View Resume

Projects

Cocktails and Cuisines

A project that lets you search for different recipes by name. It utilises APIs from MealDB and DrinksDB and uses HTML, CSS and Javascript including Jquery, Foundation and Accordian.

Check it out!

Workday Scheduler

A scheduler that lets you schedule tasks for standard business hours featuring HTML, CSS and Javascript including moment.js.

Check it out!

Music Tracker

A music tracker app that uses MongoDB, Express, React, Node and Heroku. I have also included user authentication.

Check it out!

Weather Dashboard

A weather dashboard application that uses APIs to predict the weather and give you a 5-day forecast.

Check it out!

Fitness Tracker

A fitness tracker application that uses Javascript including Node, MySQL and API routes using starter code provided by Trinity Education.

Check it out!
